chunks.text_preview: Horizon midsize | Minase watches | Handmade in Japan. Minase is a luxury watch brand based in Japan. Handcrafted by skilled watchmakers, the highly qualitative hand-made timepieces embody Japanese values, traditions and typical crafts. All the watches are polished with the sallaz (zaratsu) technique

static_fields.headline: Horizon midsize | Minase watches | Handmade in Japan
static_fields.author.name: kellyhenriksen
static_fields.description: Minase is a luxury watch brand based in Japan. Handcrafted by skilled watchmakers, the highly qualitative hand-made timepieces embody Japanese values, traditions and typical crafts. All the watches are polished with the sallaz (zaratsu) technique. Minase has 4 collections: Divido, horizon, 5 windows and Masterpieces. Minase watches are for sale on Chrono24 or on our ch webshop at their best prices
static_fields.name: Horizon midsize | Minase watches | Handmade in Japan
